page.title: 14The Rayleigh Road (A129)
page.content: Our school lies just off the main road from Billericay to Brentwood.We have had a petition in the library and at the local D.I.Y store so that people can sign it and request that a pelican crossing be installed.One thousand seven hundred people signed it. Brentwood Traffic Police have said that there have been 13 accidents in the area over the last two years. One accident earlier this year was fatal.A member of our class was also involved with a car.We visited the crossing a few days ago and noticed that a safety barrier has been put near the crossing .We also counted the number of vehicles which went over the crossing and recorded them_one car every three seconds and that was during a quiet part of the afternoon. A"High Risk Accident Site"has also been identified.
